thread.title: June Sproat
thread.title_full: Barbeques Galore reviewed by June Sproat

author: June Sproat
title: June Sproat
text:
We purchased a Zieglier Brown barbeque on the 4th Feb 2017 at Barbeques Galore Myree served by Jess
Prior to making our final decision we had done a lot of research on the net read reviews of all makes available plus visited 4 different shops to see other products and make comparisons re size ,weight, function, material made of , heat, plates air vents, accessories warranty service ease of cleaning etc
We used it the same day and it cooked beyond our expectations it was hot very quickly and our meat for 4 cooked perfectly within 10 minutes
